content: Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in an optional area of the Bamboo Grove, this Toad Guai will ambush you as you explore a marsh, and can use its long tongue as a formidable weapon.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in an optional area of the Bamboo Grove, this Toad Guai will ambush you as you explore a marsh, and can use its long tongue as a formidable weapon.
